name: Firefox - Animated Addons Bar v2
description:
An updated version of style 40215.

The Addon bar is hidden by default, and a grip is now present at the bottom of the window to unfold the addon bar.
This way the hot zone is smaller than the previous version, and does not break sites with controls on the bottom (like Google Talk for example).
additional_info:
To customize or fix Firefox, you can also have a look at my other styles :
http://userstyles.org/styles/browse/all/Firefox%20lOtR

------------
How to Use :
------------
To show the grip, you need to have a spacer or a spring anywhere in the addons-bar before installing the style. Unless you have already customized it, you should have a spring already, so nothing to worry about.
